original_title: Jim Thompson: The Man & the Legend
overview: When the "Silk King" Jim Thompson came to Thailand at the end of World War 2, he became one of the most famous Americans living in Asia. His disappearance in the Malaysian jungle in 1967 is one of the greatest mysteries of the 20th century
tagline: All sorts of stories from people who have known Jim Thompson
title: Jim Thompson: The Man & the Legend
